title: Vroooom! Meet the Mopeds
content:
Very excited about the release of my first font in a very long while. In almost every way I am indebted to Typophile. It started as a [Type Battle entry](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202235825/http:/typophile.com/battle28) and progressed with [blog feedback](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202235825/http:/typophile.com/blog/7783). You can find out more about it at my website: [www.aquatoad.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202235825/http:/www.aquatoad.com/). If you like what you see, head on over to the [good people at veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202235825/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000436#specimen) and take it for a spin!

Thanks Typophile!  
Randy Jones  
Aquatoad Design

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202235825im_/http:/typophile.com/files/moped_cover_5174.gif)

author: Randy

comments.content: Yessss, great news! How wonderful to see this released. :-D
Congratulations! I'm loving the C and R. :)
I spotted this on Veer the other day... Congrats, Randy! Beautiful job!
I've been so busy lately, I completely missed this. Absolutely gorgeous, Randy. Very nicely done.
Tasty curves! Now I'm in for a coffee ;)

Very nice, it reminds me of Deliscript (which is a good thing) and also puts me in mind of Mark's Coquette (also a good thing).

Well done Randy.

Nick Cooke

I just saw this - very nice!  
A lot of intelligent decisions.

hhp
